account.descriptionLink:
Proposal to adopt 2025 priorities to enhance the long-term value of the ZBCN token. Key initiatives include merging the payroll, payments, and cards platform into the Zebec Pay super-app; expanding the white-label card program; building out a ZBCN staking tool; piloting ZePIN; expanding the use of ZAI across products; and upgrading Zebec Vaults.

Request that the Zebec team develop and execute a roadmap aligned with these priorities.
account.name: Zebec Network Roadmap 2025

account.descriptionLink:
Proposal to reinstate the ZBCN Buyback Program, to reduce the circulating supply of ZBCN, increase its scarcity and maintain demand by executing monthly buyback tied to partner contracts and Zebec card monthly volume. 

ZBCN's role as a utility token has reduced in terms of gas fee usage because most of the transaction processing for our products is now on Solana. To support ZBCNâ€™s long-term value and align with our deflationary tokenomics strategy, we propose to resume the buyback program.
account.name: $ZBCN: Buyback Program 2024
